name: BELOW THE RIFT
description:
Below The Rift is a GameBoy-Style puzzle game in which you have to escape another dimension without being caught by a guardian.

The game is designed to imitate the 6-button control system and graphics of the original GameBoy and features 16 levels that each require a unique way to proceed.

The game is free and will stay free no matter what. It may say "Name your own price" but you should really spend your money on something else in my opinion. Anyways, I hope you will have as much fun playing the game as i did making it :) 

if you come across any bugs and glitches in the game please send me a message and i will try to fix them.
